name: Stripe-Mirakl Connector
description: Connects a Mirakl marketplace with a Stripe Connect account

APP_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.description: If you need to call operator APIs from a front on a different domain, you can enable CORS

SMC_MAILER.description: The entire Symfony Mailer configuration using a DSN-like URL format. See https://symfony.com/doc/current/components/mailer.html#mailer-dsn

SMC_MESSENGER.description: The transport used for the queuing system.

SMC_KYC_REDIRECT_URL.description: The URL we will redirect the seller to after a successful account creation. Will be requested by a seller, must be publicly available. Default will be $MIRAKL_HOST_NAME/mmp/shop/account/shop

SMC_STRIPE_CLIENT_ID.description: Your Stripe Connect Client ID. Available in your connect dashboard. https://dashboard.stripe.com/account/applications/settings

SMC_ENABLE_TRANSFERS.description: Flag to enable/disable the automatic transfer process for you. Default is false.

SMC_ENABLE_REFUNDS.description: Flag to enable/disable the automatic refund process for you. Default is false.
